titles.title: A bill to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct a study on black carbon emissions.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 110-489.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1060.
